Class Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Protocol
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProtocolTCP, ProtocolUDP

    public abstract class Protocol
extends Object
    Classe abstraite permettant de représenter un protocole de communication.
    Author:
    Dorian, Mickaël, Raphaël, Thibault
